text:
Created attachment 30803
catalina.jar naming context judge add aslias floder retrieve

hi, guys, I want to know why T7 not support to WebDAV upload or delete file to aliases floder, and I hack some code to support it
creator: virgil.hong@gmail.com

text: Fix typos in title. Mark as an enhancement.
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
Aliases were always intended to be read-only since they may be shared by multiple web applications.

I don't think that this enhancement is going to be implemented in the 7.0.x branch but the new resources implementation in 8.0.x (that replaces aliases and a number of similar features) supports read-write for the feature that replaced aliases. In 8.0.x they are read/write bu default with an option to make them read-only.

I am marking this as fixed as the feature is available in 8.0.x and unliekly to be back-ported to 7.0.x
creator: markt@apache.org
